snippet: For the past 100 years, competitors have tested their mettle in this five-part series of contests — fencing, swimming, riding, running and shooting — designed to identify a well-rounded athlete.
abstract: For the past 100 years, competitors have tested their mettle in this five-part series of contests — fencing, swimming, riding, running and shooting — designed to identify a well-rounded athlete.

headline.main: Last but Not Least, Modern Pentathlon
